dotnetType.name: TypeResolverCase
dotnetType.remarks:
See the <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.TypeResolution" /> class for more information about the resolution
            framework.

overloads.summary: Determines whether the case can be applied to a type.

returns.summary: A subclass of <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.TypeResolution" /> that contains information about the type.

overloads.summary:
Resolves information for a .NET type. If the case does not apply to the provided type,
            this method should throw an exception.

typeSignatures.value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit TypeResolverCase extends System.Object implements class Chr.Avro.Resolution.ITypeResolverCase
